column4: i'm trying to setup a dri driver for my via/s3g video card, but when I do I get dependency errors.  can anyone help?
i'm trying to setup a dri driver for my via/s3g video card, but when I do I get dependency errors.  can anyone help?
you're probably not going to have muc hluck wihtout an nvidia
what should I do to try to fix the dependancy errors?
do an lspci and tell me the string for your video card
I got lots of unknown device messages
look for your video card info
or do Sytem -> Administration -> Device Manager
I got that part, but all I get for video is stuff like 0000:00:00.0 Host bridge: VIA Technologies, Inc.: Unknown device 0204
check under your AGP bridge in device manager
i'm not even seeing an agp bridge...
sorry dude, i havent the slightest idea then!
